description:
⚡️ Get $21 off and Learn to code! Add Arduino microcontrollers to your own projects with our online course Arduino for Makers: https://ilt.ms/SCREEN99

🔗 The Arduino code library I started with for this project, to emulate WeMo devices for Amazon Alexa: https://github.com/n8henrie/fauxmo

🛠 Join The Maker Alliance to directly support the channel and access exclusive videos, discounts, and our private Discord community!
